nodes.text: Interceptor Eight was a squadron of starfighters assigned to the Endurance-class fleet carrier Intrepid of the New Republic Defense Fleet Fifth Battle Group.

Immediately prior to the Battle of Doornik-319, Interceptor Eight was one of the squadrons prepared for immediate launch aboard the Intrepid, and when the Intrepid entered the system, Interceptor Eight was part of the fleet carrier's fighter screen, and participated in the ensuing battle during the Yevethan ambush.
